
                            
                            <p>酸奶舍不得用好快递，申通，到货都常温了 <br> 卖家说法也是无耻，背面都写了2-6度保存，他说能常温存4天，反正我退回了。你们在买小心吧 <br> 百亿补贴用的5折卷<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/27/194949qo7fsjihzgpvmrfv.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/27/194949qo7fsjihzgpvmrfv.jpg"> </p>
